references.paper_title: Mip-NeRF 360: Unbounded anti-aliased neural radiance fields
references.reason: This paper is foundational for many of the techniques in 3D reconstruction used by StdGEN, providing a key method for efficient and high-quality radiance field rendering.

This work provides a significant advancement in generating high-quality 3D character models by combining neural radiance fields with articulated human models, directly influencing the approach of StdGEN.

references.paper_title: LRM: Large reconstruction model for single image to 3D
references.reason: This paper introduces the Large Reconstruction Model (LRM) which forms the basis of StdGEN’s core reconstruction method, enabling efficient 3D model generation from 2D images.

references.paper_title: CharacterGen: Efficient 3D character generation from single images with multi-view pose canonicalization
references.reason: CharacterGen is a closely related work to StdGEN, and this paper directly addresses the challenge of 3D character generation from a single image. StdGEN builds upon and improves upon many of CharacterGen's techniques.

references.paper_title: InstantMesh: Efficient 3D mesh generation from a single image with sparse-view large reconstruction models
references.reason: InstantMesh is a key component within the StdGEN pipeline, providing the method for creating high-quality meshes from implicit surface representations.  Its efficient and differentiable approach is essential to the model’s success.
